name: The Sequel To The Prequel That Never Happened
name_original: The Sequel To The Prequel That Never Happened
description:
The party is running for their life as you beat the dragon and stole the treasure. Minions and obstacles are in your way as the party tries to escape! You have 10 health and need to avoid or use abilities to defeat obstacles in your way.
Any obstacles hit will reduce health by 1 Try your best to avoid obstacles and use your abilities wisely as they are on cooldown and can be used to destroy certain objects.

Move joystick left to right to move to different lanes

Controls:

A - Party jumps to avoid fallen logs

B - is the knights slash that will destroy webs and dragons. Use wisely as the knight will need time to get her broadsword in position to swing again

Y - archer shoots arrows at dragons and targets. Use them wisely as you only have 5

X - mage will cast a shield over the party to protect them from dragons, targets, and webs. Use wisely as the mage needs time to prepare after each use.
